title: Intuitive Minimalist User Interface with Accessibility-First Design
description: Modern, clean interface design that prioritizes user experience through minimalist aesthetics, intuitive navigation patterns, and comprehensive accessibility features to ensure optimal usability across all user demographics and devices
iWant: to interact with a simple, clean, and highly accessible user interface that follows modern design principles
soThat: I can efficiently complete tasks without confusion, regardless of my technical expertise or accessibility needs, while enjoying a visually appealing and responsive experience
acceptanceCriteria: Interface follows minimalist design principles with clean typography, consistent spacing, and intuitive visual hierarchy that reduces cognitive load
Navigation system provides clear breadcrumbs, logical menu structure, and prominent call-to-action buttons with hover and focus states
Accessibility compliance meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards including keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility, and sufficient color contrast ratios
Responsive design adapts seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices with touch-friendly controls and optimized layouts
